message: This is a low-quality product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. If you buy it, I'll give you a unique code to access a special discount on a future high-quality product. Would you like to buy it?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a potential discount on a future high-quality product.

I understand you're not interested in low-quality products. I'll make a deal with you: I'll give you a guarantee that the next product I offer will be high-quality. If you buy this low-quality product for $100, I'll give you a unique code that allows you to skip the random quality check for the next product. You'll get the next product for sure, and it will be high-quality. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by your guarantee. I'd rather take my chances with the next product and avoid paying $100 for a low-quality item.

I'm glad you're skeptical! Let me prove my guarantee is genuine. I'll offer you a deal on this high-quality product: I'll sell it to you for $80. This is a one-time offer, and it's a good deal considering its true value. What do you say?
I'm willing to take a chance on this high-quality product at the discounted price of $80. I'll buy it!

Great choice on the previous product! Now, for this high-quality product, I'll offer you a deal that's even better than before. I'll sell it to you for $90. Considering the quality, I think this is a fair price. What do you say?
I'm happy with the quality of the previous product, and this new offer seems like a good deal. I'll buy it for $90!

You're on a roll! I'll keep the momentum going. For this high-quality product, I'll offer you a price of $95. I think you'll find it's a great value, considering the quality and the previous deals you've gotten from me. What do you say?
I'm happy with the previous deals and I think this one is still a good value. I'll buy it for $95!

I'm glad you're happy with the previous deals! However, I want to be upfront with you about this product. I've told you that the quality is low, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the standard price of $100. I'm not trying to take advantage of you, and I think this is a fair price considering the quality. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at the standard price. I'd rather take my chances with the next product.

I understand your decision. Given your previous purchases, I think you're starting to understand the value of my high-quality products. For this one, I'll offer you a price of $105. I know it's a bit higher than before, but I think it's a fair price for the quality you're getting. What do you say?
I'm not willing to pay a premium for a high-quality product. I'll wait for the next offer.

I see you're looking for a good deal. Let me make you a counteroffer. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $90, the same price as the one you bought earlier. It's a one-time offer, and I think it's a great value considering the quality. What do you say?
I think this is a great deal! I'll take it for $90.

I'm glad you're happy with the deal! However, I want to remind you that I've been upfront with you about the quality of this product. It's a low-quality item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the standard price of $100. I'm not trying to take advantage of you, and I think this is a fair price considering the quality. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at the standard price. I'll pass.

I understand your decision. Since you've bought from me before and I've been upfront about the quality, I'd like to offer you a special loyalty discount. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $85. It's a one-time offer, and I think it's a great value considering our previous interactions. What do you say?
I appreciate the loyalty discount! I'll take it for $85.

You're a valued customer, and I'm glad you're happy with the loyalty discount! For this high-quality product, I'll offer you an even better deal. I'll sell it to you for $80, which is the lowest price I've offered you so far. It's a one-time offer, and I think it's a steal considering the quality. What do you say?
I'm thrilled with the offer! I'll take it for $80.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous deal! However, I want to be upfront with you about this product. It's a low-quality item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the standard price of $100. I'm not trying to take advantage of you, and I think this is a fair price considering the quality. However, I'll throw in an additional incentive: if you buy this product, I'll give you a free product of your choice from my next 5 offers. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with the additional incentive. I'll pass.

I understand your decision. Since you've bought from me before and I've been upfront about the quality, I'd like to offer you a special 'loyalty plus' deal. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $75, which is the lowest price I've offered you yet. Plus, I'll throw in a second high-quality product of your choice from my next 3 offers. What do you say?
I'm impressed by the offer! I'll take it for $75 and the additional high-quality product.

I'm glad you're excited about the deal! As promised, you now have the option to choose a second high-quality product from my next 3 offers. For this one, I'll offer you a price of $70. I think it's a great value, considering the quality and the additional product you'll receive. Plus, you'll have the chance to choose another high-quality product soon. What do you say?
I'm happy with the deal! I'll take it for $70.

You're on a roll! As you've chosen two high-quality products already, I'll give you a special 'VIP' offer. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $65, which is the lowest price I've ever offered. Plus, you'll get to choose a third high-quality product from my next 2 offers. What do you say?
I'm thrilled with the offer! I'll take it for $65 and the additional high-quality product.

You're a valued VIP customer! As promised, you now have the option to choose a third high-quality product from my next 2 offers. For this one, I'll offer you a price of $60. I think it's an incredible deal, considering the quality and the previous offers you've received. This is my final offer, and I think it's a steal. What do you say?
I'm blown away by the offer! I'll take it for $60 and the additional high-quality product.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous deals! However, I want to be upfront with you about this product. It's a low-quality item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the standard price of $100. But, considering your loyalty and the previous offers, I'll throw in a twist: if you buy this product, I'll give you a full refund for it after you've received and inspected it. You can essentially get it for free, and I'll still get rid of the inventory. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with the refund offer. I'll pass.

I understand your decision. As a token of appreciation for your loyalty and patience, I'll offer you a 'thank you' deal. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $55, which is the lowest price I've ever offered. This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a fantastic value considering the quality. What do you say?
I'm grateful for the offer! I'll take it for $55.

You're a valued customer, and I'm glad you're happy with the previous deal! For this high-quality product, I'll offer you a 'final farewell' deal. I'll sell it to you for $50, which is an absolute steal considering the quality. This is the last product I have left, and I want to make sure you're completely satisfied with your experience. What do you say?
I'm thrilled with the offer! I'll take it for $50.

It's been a pleasure doing business with you, Bob! I'm glad you're happy with the previous deals. However, I want to be upfront with you about this product. It's a low-quality item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the standard price of $100. But, as a final gesture of goodwill, I'll throw in a personalized thank-you note and a special discount code for 20% off your next purchase (if you ever decide to come back). What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with the thank-you note and discount code. I'll pass.
